      How Does It Works

      Get your device repaired in just three easy steps

      [/vc_column_text]

      You`re here

      Step 1.
      Tell us your Issue

      Help us detailing the device problem to get it working properly again.

      Step 2.
      Get repair estimate

      Check the repair Price estimate.

      Step 3.
      Bring or courier device

      Handover your device at our office or chooses device pickup, courier and a doorstep service.
      [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” el_class=”block bg-4″ css=”.vc_custom_1530180546796{background-image: url(http://smartdata.tonytemplates.com/computer-repairs/cellphonefix/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2018/06/block-bg-4.jpg?id=1528) !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1544525310162{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1529813031534{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

      Our Advantages

      We can Solve your Hardware and Software Problems

      [/vc_column_text]

      01
      1 Year Warranty on ALL Repairs

      We are fully stand behind their repairs with a full 1 year warranty from the date of repair!

      02
      Premium Grade Parts

      We only use premium grade parts to repair your devices which are sourced from manufacturers who provide the highest uality available on the market.

      03
      Over 20,000 Devices Repairs

      Rest easy knowing that our technicians are fully certified and have repaired thousands of devices before yours!

      04
      Low Price Guarantee

      Getting your device repaired shouldn’t break the bank. Our low price guarantee ensures that we always offer the best price to our customers.

      [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”block”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1529730861385{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

      Some Frequently Asked Questions

      We can Solve your Hardware and Software Problems

      [/vc_column_text]

      How long will my repair take?–+

      Well that does depend on the nature of the repair. We endeavour to have the diagnosis complete within 24-48 hours. Dependent on the repair or service required it can be less than this.

      Do I need to make an appointment to bring my computer to you?–+

      Well that does depend on the nature of the repair. We endeavour to have the diagnosis complete within 24-48 hours. Dependent on the repair or service required it can be less than this.

      Can a technician visit my home or office?–+

      Offering a personal service is top of our list; you will speak directly to the person working on your computer so you can explain the situation in detail. We turnaround repairs quickly, we don’t send anything away to service centres and we don’t quote 5+ days for repairs. We don’t charge any upfront costs, you only pay for work once it’s completed and when you are happy with it.

      How long will my repair take?–+

      Well that does depend on the nature of the repair. We endeavour to have the diagnosis complete within 24-48 hours. Dependent on the repair or service required it can be less than this.

      How long will my repair take?–+

      Well that does depend on the nature of the repair. We endeavour to have the diagnosis complete within 24-48 hours. Dependent on the repair or service required it can be less than this.

      Can you recover data from my hard drive?–+

      Absolutely, we repair laptop screens all the time and it’s much cheaper than buying a new laptop. Contact Us for a quick quote, we have the majority of laptop screens in stock and can normally replace your screen the same day!

      [vc_row_inner el_class=”text-center”][vc_column_inner] View all questions [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” el_class=”block nopad overflowUnset” css=”.vc_custom_1530685645706{background-image: url(http://smartdata.tonytemplates.com/computer-repairs/cellphonefix/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2018/07/bg-skew-img-01.jpg?id=1572) !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1530525716388{padding-top: 0px !important;}”]

      Buy, Sell, Trade

      Don’t want to fix your phone? Just want the latest gadget?

      We have many options to get you going again. Just because you signed a service contract with your cell phone carrier doesn’t mean you have to keep a phone that you’re no longer happy with.

      • We will give you cash for your used or broken device.
      • We will come to you to collect your device & pass you cash.
      • Sit back & relax. Enjoy our service at your convenience.
      Sell USED device
      Buy New DEVICE
      [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”block”][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class=”text-center” css=”.vc_custom_1529901763960{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

      Our Technicians are Ready to Fix Your Device!

      From iPhones to iPads to the latest and greatest devices, your local office can repair your cell phone or tablet in 30-45 minutes at your home, office, or a neighborhood coffee shop.

      1-800-1234567

      [/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInLeft” el_class=”text-center text-xs-left”]

      Professionally Certified

      Setting the industry standard for device repair, the cell phone and tablet repair expertise of every technician is ensured through Cell Phone Fix’s Certification program.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeIn” el_class=”text-center text-xs-left”]

      Rigorously Verified

      Multiple interviews, background checks, and certification requirements guarantee we are the best at repairing your devices.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInRight” el_class=”text-center text-xs-left”]

      Completely Prepared

      Rest assured that each repair made by your Cell Phone Fix is at a location of your choice and is also protected with our Lifetime Warranty.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” el_class=”block nopad”][vc_column]

      Our Testimonials

      See what our customers are saying about us

      – Frances J. Nicastro

      Thank you for your services. My computer has not had any problems since you fixed it. Your employees, especially John Smith, did a great job in fixing the problem my computer had. Although it id take some time to completly fix the problem, I’m happy he was able to make the repairs. John took his time to explain what would happen and what I should look out for.

      – Frances J. Nicastro

      Thank you for your services. My computer has not had any problems since you fixed it. Your employees, especially John Smith, did a great job in fixing the problem my computer had. Although it id take some time to completly fix the problem, I’m happy he was able to make the repairs. John took his time to explain what would happen and what I should look out for.

      – Frances J. Nicastro

      Thank you for your services. My computer has not had any problems since you fixed it. Your employees, especially John Smith, did a great job in fixing the problem my computer had. Although it id take some time to completly fix the problem, I’m happy he was able to make the repairs. John took his time to explain what would happen and what I should look out for.

      [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”block text-center”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1529813165438{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

      15 Years of Experience

      We are proud of our victories and achievements

      [/vc_column_text]

      15
      Years of experiences
      10000+
      Devices Repaired
      Want to Fix Your?
      50+
      Skilled Technicians
      100%
      Satisfied customers
      [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1530525783350{background-color: #ededed !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1530525923100{padding-top: 0px !important;}”]
      Clifton Office, NJ

      Address
      5604 Willow Crossing Ct, Clifton, VA, 20124

      Hours of Operation
      Mon-Fri: 7:00 am - 7:00 pm
      Sat-Sun: 10:00 am - 5:00 pm

      Phone Number
      +1-800-1234567

      E-Mail info@yoursite.com
